mapper.insert: insert into request(mno, pno, conts, meal, train, date, res, neut, anifd, manfd, bark, diz) values(#{mno},#{pno},#{conts},#{meal},#{train},#{date},#{res},#{neut},#{anifd},#{manfd},#{bark},#{diz})
mapper.select: select req, p.amt, p.nick, p.pno, r.mno, m.name, date, conts, meal, train, date, res, neut, anifd, manfd, bark, diz, ans, stat from request as r left outer join petsitter as p on p.pno = r.pno left outer join member as m on r.mno = m.mno where p.pno=#{pno} r.mno=#{mno} order by req DESC

select req, r.mno, r.pno, date, conts, res, neut, anifd,manfd,bark,diz,meal,train,stat,ans ,p.ktalk, pm.tel as p_tel, m.tel as m_tel from request as r left outer join petsitter as p on p.pno = r.pno left outer join member as m on r.mno = m.mno left outer join member as pm on p.pno = pm.mno where req=#{req}
select req, mno, date from request as r left outer join petsitter as p on p.pno = r.pno where p.pno=5 order by REQ DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select count(*) from request where pno=#{pno}
